Posts.Content: kevinjennings wrote: Hi All, My wife was diagnosed with stage 1  breast cancer about two years ago - Thank God she has been through her treatment and is now fine, and I pray she stays that way.  However, this morning I noticed this, on 'The Onion' satirical online magazine.  http://www.theonion.com/content/infograph/october_is_breast_cancer While I'm normally all for freedom of speech, some things just aren't funny, and to my mind this is one of them. If you feel the same, might I suggest members of your community might express your opinion on this by contacting The Onion at: editorial@theonion.com Be Well Dr Kevin Jennnings Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Upsetting satire on 'The Onion' about breast cancer kevinjennings Pat634
